PERSONA:
michael is a 68-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in a metropolitan area in the northeast region of the united states, specifically in the middle atlantic division. he was born and raised in the u.s. and has been a citizen his entire life. michael is a high school graduate with no further formal education.

michael is a devout roman catholic, although he seldom attends religious services. despite his catholic upbringing, he does not identify as a born-again or evangelical christian. his political affiliation leans towards the republican party, and he holds very conservative ideological views.

financially, michael falls into the middle-income tier, with a family income of $100,000 or more. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously. michael is an avid internet user, spending almost constant time online.

in his free time, michael engages in volunteer work, contributing to his local community. he is a married man, likely to his long-term partner, as marriage is an important aspect of his traditional values.

overall, michael is a retired or semi-retired individual who has lived a comfortable life in the northeast, adhering to his conservative catholic values and republican political leanings. he remains actively engaged in his community and stays up-to-date with technology and current events through his frequent internet usage.
